channel.title: CVE Feed for Rextheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rextheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-47449|2024-08-03T14:55:08.059Z -- rextheme -- cart%20lift%20%E2%80%93%20abandoned%20cart%20recovery%20for%20woocommerce%20and%20edd
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RexTheme Cart Lift – Abandoned Cart Recovery for WooCommerce and EDD plugin <= 3.1.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-52144|2024-08-02T22:48:12.542Z -- rextheme -- product%20feed%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in RexTheme Product Feed Manager.This issue affects Product Feed Manager: from n/a through 7.3.15.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in RexTheme Product Feed Manager.This issue affects Product Feed Manager: from n/a through 7.3.15.
